questionTitle: You ____ go there with me. I can handle it; it's not difficult. (Absence of necessity)
____ bring me a glass of cold water? (Request)
I ____ give you a lift to the station. My car broke down yesterday. (Ability)
I don't know what to do. - You ____ your father for advice. (Suggestion)
He didn't go to the park with us yesterday because he ____ write a report. (Necessity)
I left my bag here just five minutes ago. You ____ it! (Strong probability)
You ____ the bills two weeks ago. (Advice)
I don't know how to help you. Try asking Anton for help. He ____ be able to find a solution. (Possibility)
I ____ play tennis every day when I was younger. (Repeated action in the past)
You want to call them now? It's already after midnight! They ____ . (Strong probability)
